description: How to miter shower niche tile…I cut the tile and bevel it. Then I use a 200 or 400 grit electroplated polishing pad. That makes the bevel cut look like a factory edge. When I set the tile I remove mortar behind the bevel that can interfere with the miter joint. If you’re tiling a shower and need help, join our Platinum membership to get full tutorials and personal coaching from me at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tile #bathroomremodel #homerenovation
title: How to Miter Shower Niche Tile - #shorts #homerepairtutor
